title: Time Needed to Inform All Employees
content: A company has employees with a unique ID for each employee from 0 to . The head of the company has is the one with . Each employee has one direct manager given in the array where is the direct manager of the employee, . Also it's guaranteed that the subordination relationships have a tree structure. The head of the company wants to inform all the employees of the company of an urgent piece of news. He will inform his direct subordinates and they will inform their subordinates and so on until all employees know about the urgent news. The employee needs minutes to inform all of his direct subordinates (i.e After informTime[i] minutes, all his direct subordinates can start spreading the news). Return the number of minutes needed to inform all the employees about the urgent news. if employee has no subordinates. It is guaranteed that all the employees can be informed.
